message.content:
1. The mean length of the marrow biopsy specimens was measured.
2. The mean length of the marrow biopsy specimens was longer for the OBM group.
3. The mean length of the marrow biopsy specimens for the OBM group was 15.3 mm.
4. The mean length of the marrow biopsy specimens for the SBM group was 9.8 mm.
5. The mean length of the marrow biopsy specimens for the OBM group was 56% longer than for the SBM group.
6. The difference in mean length of the marrow biopsy specimens between the OBM and SBM groups was statistically significant.
7. The P-value for the difference in mean length of the marrow biopsy specimens between the OBM and SBM groups was less than 0.003.

messages.content:
Statement: The mean length of the marrow biopsy specimens was significantly longer (56%) for the OBM group (15.3 mm) than for the standard bone marrow (SBM) group (9.8 mm), P<0.003.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
